instructions: Enter the Recovery Key you should have printed or saved to your computer when you first set up two-step verification. Press Continue . Check your phone for a text message from Apple. Enter that code into the Enter verification code screen on Apple's website. Click Continue . Set up an entirely new password on the Reset Password page. Press the Reset Password button to finally reset your iCloud Mail password.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap the Bluetooth switch to turn on Bluetooth. On the other device, turn on Bluetooth and make discoverable. Tap Bluetooth . Select the other device for pairing. If prompted, enter or verify the PIN. The default PIN is 1234 . Tap PAIR . On the other device, accept the pairing. If too much time elapses before accepting, pairing will time out.
From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap the Bluetooth switch to the ON position to turn on. Tap the Bluetooth switch to the OFF position to turn off.
